description: Capable of developing full stack applications from the ground up. The stack I currently use for full stack development is MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, ReactJS, Node.js).
I love creating front end applications! My main tech stack for developing in the front end is with ReactJS. If you have a design ready and need a developer to build it, I’m your guy!
Web sites must be highly strategic, detail-oriented, organized and process-focused. This is the combination of what a good UI can do. Let’s work together to build something awesome!
